bibl.title: Letter from L.O. Howard to Jefferson Randolph Kean, March 28, 1925

div1.p: Howard informs Kean that the editors of "Science" want him to write another review.

div1.head: Letter from L.O. Howard to Jefferson Randolph Kean, March 28, 1925
div1.opener:
UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
BUREAU OF ENTOMOLOGY
WASHINGTON, D. C.
March 28, 1925.
Col. J. R. Kean,
Army Medical Museum,
Washington, D. C.
My dear Colonel Kean:
div1.p:
I enclose a letter just received from Prof. Cattell in answer
to one which I wrote him sending him a separate of your editorial in
The Military Surgeon, and suggesting that he reprint it in Science.
I hope that you will feel that it is worth while to write him an
especial review along the lines indicated in this note.
Kindly, at your leisure, return his letter to me.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, L. O. Howard
Chief of Bureau. LOH/mwe
Encl.
